task.title: Delete Saved Layout
task.shortdesc: Delete a user-created Session Editor layout.

step.cmd: Click the Select layout button at the top left of the Session Editor window and go to the Delete layout menu item, or go to the View Delete layout menu, and select the layout you wish to delete.
step.stepresult: A confirmation dialog will appear, asking whether you wish to delete the layout.

step.cmd: If you are unsure whether you'd like to delete this layout, click No. Otherwise, click Yes to continue.
step.stepresult: The user-created layout will no longer appear in layout menus.
